messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN NORTH EAST CAMBRIDGESHIRE
messages.content: Steve Barclay lives in the constituency, understands the issues affecting us and is active locally in getting things done. He has a successful track record in business, most recently working in financial crime prevention. He will be effective in speaking up for you in Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Steve Barclay has campaigned against the closure of local police cells, the loss of the local Driving Test Centre and changes to rural paramedic cover.

Steve has championed the need for better rail and road transport links to and from North East Cambridgeshire. He has also called for improvements to Fenland road safety, including presenting a petition at No. 10.
Steve will campaign for fairer funding to ensure we can better address local needs, including improved play facilities and youth clubs so young people have more to do.

images.caption: LEFT: CAMPAIGNING ON LOCAL ISSUES - Steve Barclay has the ability and determination to fight for your interests as your MP.
RIGHT: WORKING TO IMPROVE TRANSPORT LINKS AND ROAD SAFETY - Steve has championed the need for better rail and road transport links to and from North East Cambridgeshire.
ABOVE: SUPPORT FAIRER FUNDING - We receive less per head in funding than in Gordon Brown's own constituency. Steve will campaign for fairer funding to ensure we can better address local needs.
